data.text: @ryan_batty Yeah - no. He is an entitled spoiled millionaire who decided to use his platform for evil instead of good. Now he has faced the consequences of his choices and he is trying to slide on a wishful “mea culpa” without the actual culpa. I don’t think so. Move along.
@ryan_batty It has been proven that COVID was man made. Lol. But OK buddy
@ryan_batty He can do whatever he wants, preferably away from Edmonton
@loxyisme I can’t imagine why anyone would.

This is someone who has shared a video referring to COVID as a plandemic. This isn’t someone who’s just unsure about the vaccine, he’s shared misinformation. Not getting vaccinated is stupid. This just takes it to another level. And I will absolutely judge him for that.
@ryan_batty I don’t respect his decision. Why do I need to respect bad decisions?
